data.name: Coloring Pixels - Flag 2 Pack
data.detailed_description:
Flag 2 Book

This Flag-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The second flag book but this time with a twist!

Each image shows a part of the world map, and each country in that area is depicted in the colours of that nation's flag!

Contents

The Flag 2 book unlocks the following images (image sizes TBC):
  • Africa
  • Australia
  • Balkans
  • Caucasia
  • Central Asia
  • East Asia
  • Europe
  • Europe during WW1
  • Germamia
  • The Gulf of Mexico
  • Iberia
  • The Mediterranean
  • The Middle East
  • North America
  • Northern Europe
  • Oceania
  • South East Asia
  • South America
  • Southern Asia
  • The Isles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
